oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brown, Genevieve
Irby, Beverly J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This issue explores several perspectives ranging from Feminist Epistemology to learning how to turn anger into knowledge. The reflective articles in this edition include subjects which pertain to things that effect women in the workplace such as: stereotypes, ideologies, and anger. These selections also discus how women may overcome such barriers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Education Leadership Research Center, Texas A&M University
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Advancing Women in Leadership Journal; Vol. 3, No. 2 = No. 7 (2000 Summer)
